elems.body:
local tab = {}

for i,n in pairs(self.PixeraInstances) do
	for t,p in pairs(n) do
		if timelineName == nil then
			for g,l in pairs(p.Timelines.getTimelinesSelected()) do
				table.insert(tab,l.play)
			end
		else
			local handle = p.Timelines.Timeline.getInst(timelineName)
			if handle ~= nil then
				table.insert(tab,handle.play)
			end
		end
	end
end

for i,n in pairs(tab) do
	if n ~= nil then
		n()
	end
end

elems.body:
local fadeDuration = fadeDuration or 1 --default value 
local tab = {}
for i,n in pairs(self.PixeraInstances) do
	for t,p in pairs(n) do
		if timelineName == nil then
			for g,l in pairs(p.Timelines.getTimelinesSelected()) do
				local fadeDuration = l.getFps() * fadeDuration
				table.insert(tab,l.startOpacityAnimation(true,fadeDuration))
			end
		else
			local handle = p.Timelines.Timeline.getInst(timelineName)
			if handle ~= nil then
				local fadeDuration = handle.getFps() * fadeDuration
				table.insert(tab,handle.startOpacityAnimation(true,fadeDuration))
			end
		end
	end
end

for i,n in pairs(tab) do
	if n ~= nil then
		n()
	end
end
elems.name: fadeInTimeline

elems.body:
local fadeDuration = fadeDuration or 1 --default value 
local tab = {}
for i,n in pairs(self.PixeraInstances) do
	for t,p in pairs(n) do
		if timelineName == nil then
			for g,l in pairs(p.Timelines.getTimelinesSelected()) do
				local fadeDuration = l.getFps() * fadeDuration
				table.insert(tab,l.startOpacityAnimation(false,fadeDuration))
			end
		else
			local handle = p.Timelines.Timeline.getInst(timelineName)
			if handle ~= nil then
				local fadeDuration = handle.getFps() * fadeDuration
				table.insert(tab,handle.startOpacityAnimation(false,fadeDuration))
			end
		end
	end
end

for i,n in pairs(tab) do
	if n ~= nil then
		n()
	end
end

elems.body:
for i,n in pairs(self.PixeraInstances) do
	for t,p in pairs(n) do
		if timelineName == nil then
			for g,l in pairs(p.Timelines.getTimelinesSelected()) do
				p.Compound.applyCueOnTimeline(l.getName(),name)
			end
		else
			p.Compound.applyCueOnTimeline(timelineName,name)
		end
	end
end
elems.name: moveToCueName

elems.body:
local blendDuration = blendDuration or 1 --default value 

for i,n in pairs(self.PixeraInstances) do
	for t,p in pairs(n) do
		if timelineName == nil then
			for g,l in pairs(p.Timelines.getTimelinesSelected()) do
				p.Compound.applyCueOnTimeline(l.getName(),name,blendDuration)
			end
		else
			p.Compound.applyCueOnTimeline(timelineName,name,blendDuration)
		end
	end
end
